visual.name: AdvancedGaugeByxViz
visual.description: Compare and visualize the actual value against a target value

dataRoles.description: Target Value of the Primary Gauge.

dataRoles.description: Minimum Value of the Primary Gauge.

dataRoles.name: maximum1
dataRoles.description: Maximum Value of the Primary Gauge.

dataRoles.description: Tooltip Values of the Primary Gauge.

dataRoles.name: value2

dataRoles.description: Target Value of the Secondary Gauge.

key.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://xviz.com

actualmarkeroffset.description: Move the marker up or down based on this offset. Use it to move the marker just above the band

fontfamily.description: Applied to all the text in the visual

enumeration.value: Lucida Grande, Lucida Sans Unicode, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Bold", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif
"Segoe UI Light", wf_segoe-ui_bold, helvetica, arial, sans-serif

gaugescalewidth2.description: Set the width of the gauge

maximumgauge1.description: The ending value of the gauge range

maximumgauge2.description: The ending value of the gauge range

minimumgauge1.description: The starting value of the gauge range

minimumgauge2.description: The starting value of the gauge range

scaleWidth.description: Set the width of the gauge

targetgauge1.description: Target value for the primary gauge

targetgauge2.description: Target value for the secondary gauge

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

xAxisReverse.description: Display axis label in reverse order.

dlActualValueOffset.description: Adjust the vertical position of the text label

dlActualValueHorizontalOffset.description: Adjust the horizontal position of the text label

dlActualValueSecondaryHorizontalOffset.description: Adjust the vertical position of the text label

dlActualValueSecondaryoffset.description: Adjust the horizontal position of the text label

dlCustomText.description: Add Custom text as label for actual value

dlCustomTextSecondary.description: Add Custom text as label for actual value

dlFontColorPrimaryText.description: Font color of the text label

dlFontColorSecondaryText.description: Font color of the text label

dlFontSizePrimaryText.description: Font size of the text label

dlFontSizeSecondaryText.description: Font size of the text label

dlOverlap.description: The overlapping data labels are hidden. Switch on to show overlapping data labels.

dlTargetPrimaryRotation.description: Rotate target value in the direction of the gauge

dlTargetSecondaryRotation.description: Rotate target value in the direction of the gauge

dlNoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to displayed in the values

gaugenoOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

negativeValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Negative values

noOfDecimal.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for the values

positiveValueFormat.description: Select the number format for  Positive values

semanticFormatting.description: Colors for underlying Data Format Types
